name: PuppetShow: Faith in the Future Collector's Edition
name_original: PuppetShow: Faith in the Future Collector's Edition
description:
PuppetShow: Faith in the Future Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by AMAX Interactive. It was originally released in 2018. It was published by Big Fish Games. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
PuppetShow: Faith in the Future Collector's Edition is available on PC.
